title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, February 24, 2021
description: “One breath taken completely; one poem, fully written, fully read — in such a moment, anything can happen.” –Jane Hirshfield, born in New York City on this day, 1953.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “One breath taken completely; one poem, fully written, fully read — in such a moment, anything can happen.” –Jane Hirshfield, born in New York City on this day, 1953.
